verses.verse: These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, all the days <S%H3117><s%> that ye live <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>.

Ye shall utterly <S%H6><s%> <S%H8763><s%> destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the places <S%H4725><s%>, wherein the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8802><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, upon the high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon the hills <S%H1389><s%>, and under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>:

And ye shall overthrow <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their pillars <S%H4676><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; and ye shall hew down <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of them out of that place <S%H4725><s%>.
Ye shall not do so <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

But unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of all your tribes <S%H7626><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, even unto his habitation <S%H7933><s%> shall ye seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thither thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

And thither ye shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, and heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and your vows <S%H5088><s%>, and your freewill offerings <S%H5071><s%>, and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of your herds <S%H1241><s%> and of your flocks <S%H6629><s%>:

And there ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in all that ye put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> unto, ye and your households <S%H1004><s%>, wherein the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee.

Ye shall not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after all the things that we do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> here this day <S%H3117><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> whatsoever is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

For ye are not as yet come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the rest <S%H4496><s%> and to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you.

But when ye go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth you to inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and when he giveth you rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from all your enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, so that ye dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%>;

Then there shall be a place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8763><s%> there; thither shall ye bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all that I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you; your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, and the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all your choice <S%H4005><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%> which ye vow <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

And ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, ye, and your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and your daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and your menservants <S%H5650><s%>, and your maidservants <S%H519><s%>, and the Levi <S%H3881><s%> that is within your gates <S%H8179><s%>; forasmuch <S%H3588><s%> as he hath no part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to thyself that thou offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> in every place <S%H4725><s%> that thou seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

But in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of thy tribes <S%H7626><s%>, there thou shalt offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and there thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all that I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee.

Notwithstanding thou mayest kill <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, whatsoever thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after <S%H185><s%>, according to the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> which he hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof, as of the roebuck <S%H6643><s%>, and as of the hart <S%H354><s%>.
Only ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>; ye shall pour <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it upon the earth <S%H776><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

Thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thy corn <S%H1715><s%>, or of thy wine <S%H8492><s%>, or of thy oil <S%H3323><s%>, or the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of thy herds <S%H1241><s%> or of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, nor any of thy vows <S%H5088><s%> which thou vowest <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, nor thy freewill offerings <S%H5071><s%>, or heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%>:

But thou must eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, thou, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy manservant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maidservant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levi <S%H3881><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>: and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in all that thou puttest <S%H4916><s%> thine hands <S%H3027><s%> unto.
Take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to thyself that thou forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the Levi <S%H3881><s%> as long as thou livest <S%H3117><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>.

When the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy border <S%H1366><s%>, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee, and thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, because thy soul <S%H5315><s%> longeth <S%H183><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, whatsoever thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after <S%H185><s%>.

If the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there be too far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thee, then thou shalt kill <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of thy herd <S%H1241><s%> and of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, as I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee, and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thy gates <S%H8179><s%> whatsoever thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after <S%H185><s%>.

Havahn as the roebuck <S%H6643><s%> and the hart <S%H354><s%> is eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, so thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them alike <S%H3162><s%>.

Only be sure <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that thou eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> not the blood <S%H1818><s%>: for the blood <S%H1818><s%> is the life <S%H5315><s%>; and thou mayest not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> with the flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
Thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; thou shalt pour <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it upon the earth <S%H776><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

Thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, and with thy children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee, when thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Only thy holy things <S%H6944><s%> which thou hast, and thy vows <S%H5088><s%>, thou shalt take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

And thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%>, upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be poured out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8735><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee, that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, and with thy children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, when thou doest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

When the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, and thou succeedest <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>;

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to thyself that thou be not snared <S%H5367><s%> <S%H8735><s%> by following <S%H310><s%> them, after <S%H310><s%> that they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8736><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and that thou enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not after their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, How did these nations <S%H1471><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>? even so will I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%>.

Thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: for every abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he hateth <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, have they done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>; for even their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> they have burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> to their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.

What thing <S%H1697><s%> soever I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you, observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it: thou shalt not add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thereto, nor diminish <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from it.
